title: "Smells like team spirit: Getting ‘art’ out of artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "Except that this song was never written by Kurt Cobain or Nirvana and discovered from some old musty attic years later; it was written by an artificial intelligence (AI) engine. To be more precise, it was written by a neural network trained on the entire body of Nirvana’s work."
